snippet.title: ENCHAIN - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1396870/ENCHAIN/
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mattlawrdev
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/6AkrEZj

Revealing, after over two years of iteration, the reimagined ENCHAIN.
You are the last corpse that will ever rise from the stone depths, dooming all creation to a ceaseless death. Unlock the secrets of the crypt, take back life from your fleshless brethren, and fight your own way out of humanity's tomb.
Demo coming in October, 2020. Game by Matthew Lawrence, with music by Oliver Trinidad.
